name: Breedr-Android
body:
### Breedr Android
Breedr is an upcoming application for Android that allows players of Pokémon games to make more informed decisions regarding their Pokémon breeding in-game.

Contributions
------------
Please feel free to contribute to this! I currently use [Bulbapedia](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Main_Page) and [Smogon](http://www.smogon.com/) as references. If you know of any better resources, please get in touch.

How to Contribute
------------

1. [Fork Breedr](https://github.com/Breedr/Breedr-Android/fork).
2. Create a branch (`git checkout -b my_junk`)
3. Commit your changes (`git commit -am "Added Junk"`)
4. Push to the branch (`git push origin my_junk`)
5. Open a Pull Request
6. Get breeding and wait for the response


### Authors and Contributors
(@ed-george) - Android Developer/Breedr founder

### Support or Contact
Contact (@ed-george) at esm@hotmail.co.uk or tweet [@edgeorge92](htttp://twitter.com/edgeorge92)
